sentences.english: Night wind Department, poplar leaves rustles, they are singing from the songs?

sentences.english: In central Georgia, sweetgum and poplar trees grow in large numbers.
sentences.chinese: 在佐治亞州中部，生長有大量的楓香樹和白楊樹。

sentences.english: There are two rows of aspens on either side of the streets.
sentences.chinese: 道路的兩邊分列着整齊的白楊樹。

sentences.english: I eulogize the tall and straight trunk of the white poplar.
sentences.chinese: 我讚美白楊樹那挺拔的樹幹。

sentences.english: An aspen leaf turning fall colors.
sentences.chinese: 白楊樹的樹葉轉變爲秋天的顏色。

sentences.english: Poplar leaves is not reversed pendulum, and I never dejected life.
sentences.chinese: 白楊樹沒有倒垂的葉片，我也從沒有垂頭喪氣的日子。

sentences.english: A poplar pierced up into the dark-blue sky and touched a white star there.
sentences.chinese: 一棵白楊樹刺破暗蘭色的天空，碰到一顆白星。

sentences.english: The trees had been thinned to increase aspen tree regeneration.
sentences.chinese: 樹林已經變得稀薄，增加了白楊樹的再生。

sentences.english: Aspen groves are often one large organism
sentences.chinese: 白楊樹林往往是一個很大的有機體。

sentences.english: Eg: The poplars stand upright in the field.
sentences.chinese: 白楊樹筆直的站在曠野上。

sentences.english: One red mitten lying lost under a poplar tree.
sentences.chinese: 一隻紅色小貓迷惘地躺在白楊樹下。

sentences.english: I again saw the rows of poplars.
sentences.chinese: 我也又一次看到了那一排排的白楊樹。

sentences.english: Thee Poplar grows up straight and tall.
On the north side of the house several poplar trees formed a small garden.
sentences.chinese: 而靠房子北邊有幾棵白楊樹圍城的一個小花園。

sentences.english: I suddenly found that I do not know since when I was a poplar tree.
sentences.chinese: 我突然發現，不知從什麼時候起，我就是一棵白楊樹。

sentences.english: Horses nuzzled the rough cottonwoods by the riverbank.
sentences.chinese: 河堤上的馬用鼻子輕蹭着粗糙的棉白楊樹。
